alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 6:18PM AKDT until August 10 at 7:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country in Alaska... * Until 700 PM AKDT. * At 617 PM AKDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Eagle, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar and Satellite indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eagle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
